views.markdown:
- Added iOS13 support - Fixed an issue where the unlock sound would play when dismissing the notification center on iOS13. - Fixed some iOS11 bugs


- Fixed an issue where the unlock sound would be played when closing the notification center on iOS11


- Added full iOS11 support
- Fixed “Hey Siri” not working when using custom volume
- Fixed some minor bugs
- Added full iOS9.3.3 support
- Minor changes in preferences
- Fixed a minor bug
- Recompiled to fix potential unknown effects or bugs on iOS7+
- Added full iOS9.1 support
- Fixed a crash that might occur on some devices

- Added full iOS9 support
- You can now use any system sound as the unlock sound
- Optimized package size
- Optimized preferences
- Fixed some minor bugs
- Added missing filter plist
- A small bug fixed
- Tweak renamed to UnlockSound to prevent confusion about newest iOS version support
- Fixed a bug where the unlock sound would sometimes be played 2 times when using TouchID to unlock the device
- Fixed a small bug

- Fixed an issue that prevents preferences change to not refresh on iOS8

- Added iOS 8 Support
- Original unlock sound file now included in package
- Fixed an issue where the unlock sound would play even when the device was in silent mode
- Fixed low volume issues when using custom volume
- Fixed some minor bugs
- added the possibility to set a custom volume level for the unlock sound

- added the possibility to use a custom sound for unlock.
